Paragraph: 37 Previously , we developed a class of benzodithiophene - based donor polymers with fluoro-dialkylthienylbenzothiadiazole being an acceptor unit that showed interesting temperature - dependent aggregation behavior when equipped with linear alkyl side chains.

Let's think step by step.

| --- |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "Class of benzodithiophene-based donor polymers" and "linear alkyl side chains" describe types of materials, while "fluoro-dialkylthienylbenzothiadiazole" is a specific chemical compound used in the material. "Previously developed" and "showed interesting behavior" are not material properties.
